statements: SELECT * FROM choreography_details WHERE counts > 8;
SELECT dance_routine, formation FROM choreography_details WHERE routine_id = 2;
SELECT routine_id, music_cue FROM choreography_details WHERE formation = 'Circle';
SELECT dance_routine, counts, formation FROM choreography_details WHERE music_cue = 'Intro';
SELECT * FROM choreography_details WHERE counts BETWEEN 6 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM choreography_details ORDER BY routine_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT dance_routine, counts FROM choreography_details WHERE formation='Circle' ORDER BY counts ASC;
SELECT * FROM choreography_details WHERE counts > 100 AND formation='Line' ORDER BY counts DESC;
SELECT routine_id, dance_routine, formation FROM choreography_details WHERE music_cue LIKE '%intro%' ORDER BY routine_id;
SELECT dance_routine, formation, music_cue FROM choreography_details WHERE counts BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY formation, counts;
SELECT * FROM choreography_details;
SELECT choreography_id, dance_routine, counts FROM choreography_details WHERE counts > 10;
SELECT dancer_id, name, age, choreography_id FROM dancers WHERE age < 20 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM choreography_details WHERE dance_routine LIKE 'Contemporary%';
SELECT dancer_id, name, choreography_id FROM dancers WHERE choreography_id = 3 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM choreography_details WHERE counts > 100 ORDER BY choreography_id DESC;
SELECT dance_routine, formations FROM choreography_details WHERE counts BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND music_cues LIKE '%intro%';
SELECT choreography_id, dance_routine, counts FROM choreography_details WHERE dance_routine ILIKE 'salsa' ORDER BY dance_routine ASC, counts DESC;
SELECT d.name, cd.dance_routine, cd.formations FROM dancers d INNER JOIN choreography_details cd ON d.choreography_id = cd.choreography_id WHERE d.age < 30 ORDER BY d.name ASC;
SELECT choreography_id, dance_routine, counts FROM choreography_details WHERE formations IS NOT NULL AND music_cues NOT LIKE '%break%';
SELECT * FROM dance_routines;
SELECT routine_name, choreographer FROM dance_routines;
SELECT routine_name, duration_minutes FROM dance_routines WHERE duration_minutes > 10;
SELECT * FROM counts WHERE beat_count = 8 ORDER BY formation DESC;
SELECT routine_name, cue_time, cue_description FROM dance_routines JOIN music_cues ON dance_routines.routine_id = music_cues.routine_id;
SELECT * FROM dance_routines WHERE duration_minutes > 10 ORDER BY routine_name DESC;
SELECT routine_name, choreographer FROM dance_routines WHERE choreographer LIKE 'John%' LIMIT 5;

SELECT cr.routine_name, c.beat_count, mc.cue_description FROM dance_routines cr JOIN counts c ON cr.routine_id = c.routine_id JOIN music_cues mc ON cr.routine_id = mc.routine_id WHERE cr.duration_minutes < 15 ORDER BY c.beat_count ASC;

SELECT cr.routine_name, c.formation, mc.cue_time FROM dance_routines cr JOIN counts c ON cr.routine_id = c.routine_id JOIN music_cues mc ON cr.routine_id = mc.routine_id WHERE c.formation = 'Circle' AND mc.cue_time BETWEEN '2022-09-01 10:00:00' AND '2022-09-01 12:00:00';
SELECT cr.routine_id, count(c.count_id) AS total_counts FROM dance_routines cr JOIN counts c ON cr.routine_id = c.routine_id GROUP BY cr.routine_id HAVING total_counts > 3 ORDER BY total_counts DESC;
SELECT * FROM dance_routines;
SELECT routine_name, choreographer FROM dance_routines WHERE choreographer IS NOT NULL;
SELECT formation_id, formation_name, number_of_dancers FROM formations WHERE number_of_dancers > 5;
SELECT count_name, tempo FROM counts WHERE tempo >= 120 ORDER BY tempo DESC;
SELECT cue_name, cue_type, cue_details FROM music_cues;
SELECT * FROM dance_routines WHERE choreographer = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM counts WHERE tempo > 120 ORDER BY count_name ASC;
SELECT routine_name, music_cues FROM dance_routines WHERE routine_id = 3;
SELECT formation_name, number_of_dancers FROM formations WHERE number_of_dancers BETWEEN 4 AND 6;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cues, MAX(beat_count) AS max_beat_count FROM counts JOIN music_cues ON counts.count_id = music_cues.cue_id;
SELECT * FROM DanceRoutines;
SELECT routine_name, counts FROM DanceRoutines WHERE formation='Circle';
SELECT dancer_name, dancer_type FROM Dancers ORDER BY dancer_name DESC;
SELECT performance_id, venue, performance_date FROM Performances WHERE venue='Theater';
SELECT group_name, group_type, choreographer_name FROM DanceGroups JOIN Choreographers ON DanceGroups.choreographer_id = Choreographers.choreographer_id;
SELECT * FROM DanceRoutines WHERE dance_id = 5;
SELECT routine_name, counts FROM DanceRoutines WHERE formation = 'Circle';
SELECT dancers.dancer_name, dancegroups.group_name FROM Dancers dancers JOIN DanceGroups dancegroups ON dancers.dancer_id = dancegroups.group_id;
SELECT performance_date, venue FROM Performances WHERE performance_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY venue DESC;
SELECT choreographer_name, email FROM Choreographers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
